creator: swatje@tiscali.be
text:
I get this error when i start Apach.exe: <730048>Elk socketadres 
<protocol/netwerkadres/poort> kan normaal slechts ÚÚn keer worden gebruikt. : 
make_sock: could not bind to address 0.0.0.0:80
no listening sockets availible, shutting down
Unable to open logs
_______________________________________________
translation from dutch: Evrey socketaddress <protocol/networkaddress/port> can 
have normally only be used once. : .......... (the rest is in english)



I might need to say that i have a router (external hardware not software)...
My config of my tcp/ip is set to automatic and i installed a program where i 
need to select my computer name and a ip ( D-Link DI-701 --- Setup Program, 
version 3.20) and my type is a dlink di-701... 

Can somebody help me?

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
You apparently have another server running on this box.  Please pose your
  question to the appropriate user support list, the bugzilla database is only
  for reporting bugs and errors in the software.
